original_text: And after it is thrown on the fire as fuel and the fire burns both ends and chars the middle, is it then useful for anything?
korean_text: 불에 던질 땔감이 될 뿐이라 불이 그 두 끝을 사르고 그 가운데도 태웠으면 제조에 무슨 소용이 있겠느냐

sentences.original_text: And after it is thrown on the fire as fuel
and the fire burns both ends
is it then useful for anything?
